function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate ventilation and cooling due to increased space efficiency","Impact":"Reduced indoor air quality, decreased performance, increased morbidity","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation and cooling systems, monitor indoor air quality","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air quality sensors, smart thermostats","People":"People working in the office space","Owner":"Facility management or building owners"},{"Description":"Increased contamination and heat loads from people and equipment","Impact":"Degradation of indoor climate, reduced performance, increased morbidity","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce contamination and heat loads, improve ventilation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, energy-efficient equipment, improved ventilation systems","People":"People working in the office space","Owner":"Facility management or building owners"},{"Description":"Negative consequences of greater efficiency on indoor climate","Impact":"Decreased productivity, increased morbidity, financial losses","Mitigation":"Balancing efficiency with indoor climate quality, monitoring performance and health metrics","Technologies":"Efficient HVAC systems, indoor climate monitoring sensors, performance tracking software","People":"People working in the office space","Owner":"Facility management or building owners"}]}
